document.topic_text: Print Pet of the Week BOBBY CURTIS/Acorn Newspapers HAPPY GIRL— Elsie is a female gray and white pit bull mix, about 4 years old. She loves to play with toys. If you would like to adopt Elsie, ask for animal ID No. A627202 at the Camarillo Animal Shelter, 600 Aviation
